Even if you don't care for the English VAs, an official release generally still has the original Japanese version, right?  Or am I just spoiled by RK? 
 
phil

Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@...> wrote:
PMK has been licensed the manga definitely so I'm guessing the anime 
too---when it first started last October I managed to get hold of 
someone through the PMK anime official site (I think their email link 
was in English) and he said they were working on US distribution so I 
guess this is it!! Yeehaa!

BUT those Japanese voice actors are so perfect as those characters....I 
do so hope they choose wisely........
